test_coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of workflow steps and tool functions covered by tests.

error_detection_rate.description: Percentage of simulated errors successfully detected.

recovery_success_rate.description: Percentage of errors successfully recovered without intervention.

average_recovery_time.description: Average time to recover from errors in seconds.

test_execution_time.description: Total time to execute all tests in minutes.

regression_detection_rate.description: Percentage of regressions detected by automated tests.
